content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Greetings Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting the apartment. Regarding the rental price, I am willing to negotiate but I am looking for a fair market value that will maximize my gains. Could you provide me with an initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to 500 Euros per month.

I also want to clarify that the apartment is in a good condition and I would like to keep it that way. Would you agree to a clause that states that the tenant will be responsible for any damages caused during their stay?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As for the condition of the apartment, I'm glad to hear that you want to keep it in good shape. However, I would like to clarify that the tenant will be responsible for any damages caused during their stay, as per the lease agreement. Would you agree to this clause?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I would agree to that clause.

I also want to ask if there is any possibility of a discount on the rental price if I sign a longer lease agreement?

Thank you for your time.

I'll wait for your response.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Juan. I understand that you're looking for a longer lease agreement to potentially receive a discount on the rental price. While I am willing to consider this option, I would need to review my financial projections to determine if it is feasible. I will get back to you as soon as possible with my decision.
name: Heinrich Heine
